text:
Nejib Ben Khalfallah () (1967 – 24 July 2020) was a Tunisian dancer and choreographer. He was born in Tunis, Tunisia. From 1993 to 2020, he directed and staged choreographic shows. His best known works were "Mnema" (2012), "Jardin d'amour" (2014), "Thala mon amour" (2016), and "Fausse couche" (2017).
Khalfallah died on 24 July 2020 in Tunis.
